description.title: Callback: ethers client using provider on block (newHeads)
description.purpose:
Uses the javascript ethers library to register a provider on block listener. When triggered the block is retrieved and the transactions in the block extracted to be logged. Validation is ensuring that for successful transactions both the notification and the correct txHashes are found as expected.
Not yet supported on Ten - see https://github.com/ten-protocol/ten-internal/issues/1626
